DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy CDFR0612 CDFR0613 Bowel Cleansing Before Colonoscopy
DOC.detailed_description: This study prospective , randomize , single-blinded , parallel , 3-treatment , multi-center clinical trial . A total 297 subject schedule colonoscopy participate study assign 3 group - CDFR0612 , CDFR0613 , comparator ( Coolprep Powder ) . A subject admit hospital one day colonoscopy administrate study drug . In early morning day colonoscopy , he/she administrate study drug . Any subject carefully monitor safety hospitalisation ( 1 night ) additional 4 week follow-up period study first human trial CDFR0612 CDFR0613 .
